chat_history.message:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "guess:" and "explanation:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
guess: apple
 explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Let's begin with your first guess.

guess:aaaaa
explanation:I'm starting with all As as a placeholder guess to see if I can get any hints on the first attempt.
your guess is not a valid word for this game. Please try again

guess:abaca
explanation:I'll try a real word this time. Abaca is a five-letter word and a valid English word. If hints could be discerned from my previous guess, I'll use them to infer which letters are correct or in the correct positions.
guess_feedback: a<yellow> b<red> a<red> c<red> a<red>

guess:apple
explanation:The feedback suggests that the first and fifth letters are correct and belong in those positions. I'll keep those letters and guess a real five-letter English word—apple.
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<red> p<red> l<yellow> e<red>

guess:apfel
explanation:The previous feedback indicates that the first and fourth letters are correct and belong in their respective positions. Time to guess a word with those letters in the same positions and keep guessing.
your guess is not a valid word for this game. Please try again

guess:pical
explanation:I'm keeping the first letter as it has been correct and in the right position in all previous guesses. Meanwhile, the fourth letter 'l' appeared in the two guesses before that and was highlighted in yellow, which means it's incorrect but in the correct position. Pical is a real English word and fits the description above.
guess_feedback: p<red> i<yellow> c<red> a<green> l<green>

guess:pacif
explanation:The 'a' in the second position is correct and has been across all my guesses so far, while the first and third letters are correct but in the wrong position. The feedback from this guess will help me further refine my next guess.
your guess is not a valid word for this game. Please try again

guess:pica
explanation:The previous guess gave me some useful information. The first and fifth letters are both correct and in the right positions. Meanwhile, the 'i' sound is apparently present in the target word, so I'll go with pica, which satisfies all the above criteria and is another real English word.
the word should have exactly 5 letters. Please try again

guess:palce
explanation:I'm going to keep the first and fifth letters as they seem to be correct consistently. The previous guess also hinted that the middle sounds are 'i' and 'c'. I'll change the ending to see if it yields any better results this time.
your guess is not a valid word for this game. Please try again

guess:place
explanation:I'll make another guess building on my previous one. The word 'place' has the same letters as my previous guess in the correct positions, and it's a valid English word. I'll go with this and hope for some green hints!
guess_feedback: p<red> l<yellow> a<yellow> c<red> e<red>

guess:plain
explanation:The latest feedback tells me that the second and third letters are now incorrect. I'll go with 'plain', which has the same first and fifth letters, both of which have been consistently correct so far.
